tool.name: Create or Update Organism
tool.description: will create the organism if it doesn't exist, and update otherwise

param.name: group
param.label: Grant access to a user group

tool.help:
**What it does**
Adds an organism to the Apollo database. The tool takes the output of a JBrowse run as that contains all of the necessary information for which tracks are appropriate for a given analysis.
**WARNINGS**
- Do not use names which conflict with other users. - If you provide an Apollo JSON file, only the first organism block will be used in Common Name determination, as it is improbable you wish to apply a single JBrowse instance to multiple organisms.
@REFERENCES@
